headline: BMO Maintains Outperform Rating on Ecolab (ECL) Despite Post-Earnings Share Decline
summary: Ecolab Inc. (NYSE:ECL) ranks among the stocks in Bill Gates’ portfolio that analysts are watching. On October 30, BMO Capital maintained its Outperform rating on Ecolab Inc. (NYSE:ECL) but reduced its price target from $310 to $307 for the company’s shares. Despite Ecolab’s usual safe-haven status, BMO Capital sees the 7% sell-off in shares following […]
